sentences.en: And whether his decision was a mistake is at least debatable.
sentences.cn: 至于他的决定是对是错,至少是可以争论的.

sentences.en: However the role of BMP in fresh fractures debatable.
sentences.cn: 但是BMP在新发生的骨折中的作用存在争论.

sentences.en: It is always a debatable issue according with my personal development.
sentences.cn: 这是一直伴随在个人发展中的争议.

sentences.en: It is debatable whether it is cost - effective .
sentences.cn: 它的 成本效益 如何,尚无定论.

sentences.en: It is debatable whether or not antibiotics would make any difference.
sentences.cn: 抗生素能否起到什么作用还无法定论。

sentences.en: SPIEGEL: That sounds like a debatable view. Historians will complain.
sentences.cn: 《明镜》: 这听起来像是个可供争议的看法. 历史学家会有意见的.

sentences.en: That a debatable point, not everyone would agree with your opinion.
sentences.cn: 那一点是可以辩论的, “并非”每个人都会同意你的看法.

sentences.en: That's a debatable point, not everyone would agree with your opinion.
sentences.cn: 那一点是可以辩论的, 并非每个人都会同意你的看法.

sentences.en: That's debatable since we have several other excellent students asas Kelly.
sentences.cn: 这种说法大有问题,因为我们还有好几位跟凯利一样优秀的学生.

sentences.en: The figures are debatable, but there is one clear difference.
sentences.cn: 数字还有讨论余地, 不过有一处不同很明显.

sentences.en: The issues which here arisen are the classical debatable issues.
sentences.cn: 这儿出现的论题是古典的而又有争论余地的.

sentences.en: This is a highly debatable point.
sentences.cn: 这是个爭议很大的问题.

sentences.en: Whether I go there or not is a debatable issue.
Whether older women miscarry more often or whether they report more miscarriages is a debatable point.
sentences.cn: 究竟是年纪大的女性更容易流产还是她们报告了更多流产事例，这一点仍存在争议。

sentences.en: Whether the object was used for rituals is highly debatable .
sentences.cn: 这一物件是否曾用作礼器有很大的争议。

sentences.en: Whether we can stay in this situation is debatable.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下我们能否留下还很难说。

trans.tran_cn: 可争辩的，成问题的，未定的
trans.tran_en: things that are debatable are not certain because people have different opinions about them
